title: Strengthening Customer Experience Practical Skills: Foundational Medical Education Design Using Meme-Based Problem-Centered Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational understanding of pathology and neuroscience
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Enhancing creative expression skills by reinterpreting medical concepts as visual memes
Accurately explain at least 80% of core medical theories through peer analysis of memes created by fellow learners
In a Problem-Based Learning (PBL) environment, teams engage in meme creation and feedback activities at least twice weekly
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
